TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionConsumerAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 标识作为 Web 部件连接中的使用者的服务器控件中的回调方法，开发人员可用来指定有关使用者的连接点的详细信息。

span.span: Identifies the callback method in a server control acting as the consumer in a Web Parts connection, and enables developers to specify details about the consumer's connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件连接由位于某个区域的两个服务器控件组成 ，并通过从一个控件传递到另一个控件的接口实例来共享数据。A Web Parts connection consists of two server controls residing in a zone and sharing data by means of an interface instance passed from one control to the other. 提供接口实例的控件称为提供程序，接收接口实例并处理或显示数据的控件称为使用者。The control that serves the interface instance is called the provider, and the control that receives the interface instance and processes or displays the data is called the consumer. 有关连接的详细信息，请参阅 类和 [Web 部件连接概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178187(v=vs.100))。For details on connections, see the class and [Web Parts Connections Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178187(v=vs.100)). 连接中的使用者控件可以是 控件或任意类型的服务器或用户控件，但它必须具有指定为回调方法的方法。The consumer control in a connection can be a control or any type of server or user control, but it must have a method designated as a callback method. 在连接过程中调用回调方法，其目的是从提供程序接收包含数据的接口实例。The callback method is invoked during the connection process, and its purpose is to receive from the provider an interface instance that contains data. 若要指定充当使用者中的回调方法的方法，必须将 `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` 元数据元素添加到方法 (元素基于 类) 。To designate the method that serves as the callback method in a consumer, you must add a `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element to the method (the element is based on the class). 除了在使用者中指定回调方法之外，还可以使用 对象指定有关使用者连接点的某些详细信息。In addition to designating the callback method in a consumer, the object also enables you to specify certain details about a consumer's connection point. 使用者连接点是类的一个实例， 它封装了建立连接所需的使用者的所有详细信息。包括使用者的控件类型，它是否可以同时连接到多个提供程序、使用者可以从提供程序接收的接口类型、有关回调方法的详细信息，以及表示用户界面中的使用者连接点的显示名称 (UI) 。A consumer connection point is an instance of the class that encapsulates all the details about a consumer needed to establish a connection, including the consumer's control type, whether it can connect to multiple providers at the same time, what type of interface the consumer can receive from a provider, details about the callback method, and a display name that represents the consumer connection point in the user interface (UI). 每个 Web 部件连接都包含与使用者控件关联的使用者连接点。Every Web Parts connection includes a consumer connection point that is associated with the consumer control. 将 `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata 元素添加到使用者中的回调方法时，还可以使用它来指定以下有关使用者连接点的详细信息：连接点的显示名称 (的详细信息，请参阅 属性) 、使用者是否可以同时连接到多个提供商 (有关详细信息，请参阅 属性) ，连接点的 ID (详细信息，查看 属性) ，以及使用者使用 (的连接点的类型，请参阅 属性) 。When you add the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element to the callback method in a consumer, you can also use it to specify the following details about the consumer connection point: a display name for the connection point (for details, see the property), whether the consumer can connect to multiple providers at the same time (for details, see the property), an ID for the connection point (for details, see the property), and the type of the connection point that the consumer uses (for details, see the property). 该类的构造函数的四个重载 每个重载都具有参数，这些参数可用于在创建类的新实例时指定这些连接点属性中的一个或多个值。The four overloads of the constructor for the class each have parameters that allow you to specify values for one or more of these connection point properties when a new instance of the class is created. 使用者连接点的大多数属性还可以通过编程方式进行设置;使用元素设置这些 `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` 元素是可选的。Most of the properties for a consumer connection point can also be set programmatically; setting them using the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` element is optional. > [!NOTE] > 将 `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata 元素添加到使用者中的回调方法时，必须始终指定的唯一必需的参数 `displayName` (详细信息，请参阅 构造函数重载) 。When you add the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element to a callback method in a consumer, the only required parameter that you must always specify is the `displayName` parameter (for details, see the constructor overload). 此参数的值分配给 属性，当用户打开 (控件创建的连接用户界面时 ) ，显示名称表示 UI 中的使用者连接点。The value of this parameter is assigned to the property, and when a user opens the connection UI (created by the control), the display name represents the consumer connection point in the UI. 如果在使用者控件中指定了多个回调方法，你将具有多个可能的连接点供选择，并且当你向 `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` 每个回调方法添加元数据元素时，还应为该参数指定一个值 `id` ，以便每个使用者连接点都具有已知的唯一标识符。If you designate multiple callback methods in a consumer control, you will have multiple possible connection points to choose from, and when you add the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element to each callback method, you should also specify a value for the `id` parameter, so that each consumer connection point has a known, unique identifier. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类，方法是说明如何 `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` 在使用者控件中的回调方法上声明 metadata 元素。The following code example demonstrates using the class, by showing how to declare the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element on a callback method in a consumer control. 请注意，使用构造函数的最简单重载;仅 `displayName` 提供参数值。Note that the simplest overload of the constructor is used; only the `displayName` parameter value is supplied. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/rowconsumerwebpart.cs#5)] [!code-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/rowconsumerwebpart.vb#5)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类在两个 Web 部件控件之间创建基本静态连接 。The following code examples demonstrate how to create a basic, static connection between two Web Parts controls using the class. 提供程序和使用者代码文件应放在包含 .aspx 页面的应用程序文件夹下的 App_Code 文件夹中。The provider and consumer code files should be put into the App_Code folder under the application folder that contains the .aspx page. 第一个示例显示一个充当提供程序的类。The first example shows a class acting as a provider. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/rowproviderwebpart.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/rowproviderwebpart.vb#1)] 第二个示例演示作为使用者的类。The second example shows a class acting as a consumer. 请注意，方法被指定为具有 metadata 元素的回调方法 `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` 。Notice that a method is designated as the callback method with the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/rowconsumerwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/rowconsumerwebpart.vb#2)] 最后的示例显示了包含两个控件的 ASP.NET 页。The final example shows the ASP.NET page that contains the two controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/defaultcs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/defaultvb.aspx#3)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

related.span: 保护 Web 部件页面

span.span: Securing Web Parts Pages
Web Parts Connections Overview

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，指定一个值用作连接点显示名称，还可以选择指定一些值用作连接点的 ID 和/或连接点类型。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying a value to use for the connection point display name, and optionally specifying values to use for the connection point's ID, the connection point type, or both.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者控件可以有多个用 metadata 元素标记的方法 `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` 。A consumer control can have multiple methods marked with the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element. 在这种情况下，使用者将具有多个连接点，并且元素的每个实例 `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` 都应为关联的连接点指定一个唯一的 ID 值，以便可以区分使用者的连接点。In this case, the consumer would have multiple connection points, and each instance of the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` element should specify a unique ID value for the associated connection point, so that the consumer's connection points can be distinguished.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string displayName) cil managed

param.name: displayName
param.span: 一个字符串，该字符串包含使用者连接点在用户界面 (UI) 中显示的友好名称。

span.span: A string that contains a friendly name for the consumer connection point to display in the user interface (UI).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，为使用者连接点指定显示名称。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying a display name for the consumer connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建属性的实例，该属性与作为使用者的 Web 部件控件的方法一起使用。This constructor creates an instance of the attribute that is used with a method of a Web Parts control acting as a consumer. 此方法将成为提供程序和使用者之间的连接点。This method becomes the connection point between the provider and the consumer. 通常，使用此构造函数的方式是 `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` 在要指定为使用者控件中的回调方法的方法上声明元数据元素。Typically, the way you use this constructor is to declare a `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element on a method that you want to designate as a callback method in a consumer control. `displayName`参数是使用者连接点的友好名称，控件使用该连接点 来表示 UI 中使用者的连接点。The `displayName` parameter is a friendly name of the consumer connection point that is used by the control to represent a consumer's connection point in the UI. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类，方法是说明如何 `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` 在使用者控件中的回调方法上声明 metadata 元素。The following code example demonstrates using the class, by showing how to declare the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element on a callback method in a consumer control. 请注意，使用构造函数的最简单重载;仅 `displayName` 提供参数值。Note that the simplest overload of the constructor is used; only the `displayName` parameter value is supplied. 有关运行代码示例所需的完整代码，请参阅 类概述。For the full code required to run the code example, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/rowconsumerwebpart.cs#5)] [!code-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/rowconsumerwebpart.vb#5)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，为使用者连接点指定显示名称和 ID。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying a display name and an ID for the consumer connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName`参数是使用者连接点的友好名称，控件使用该连接点 来表示 UI 中使用者的连接点。The `displayName` parameter is a friendly name of the consumer connection point that is used by the control to represent a consumer's connection point in the UI. `id`参数用于指定与特定回调方法关联的使用者连接点的 ID。The `id` parameter is used to specify the ID for the consumer connection point associated with the specific callback method. 一个控件可以有多个连接点，但 `id` 每个连接点必须是唯一的。A control can have multiple connection points, but the `id` for each must be unique. 因此，如果使用者控件中有多个回调方法，则构造函数的此重载非常有用。Therefore, this overload of the constructor is useful if you have multiple callback methods in your consumer control.

span.span: or is .

span.span: A string that contains a friendly name for the consumer connection point to display in the user interface (UI).

param.span: 一个派生自 ，且你希望将其指定为连接点对象的类型以与特定的回调方法一起使用的 。

span.span: A that derives from , and that you want to specify as the type of connection point object to use with a specific callback method.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，指定使用者连接点所使用的显示名称和特定连接点对象类型。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying a display name and a specific type of connection point object to use for the consumer connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName`参数是使用者连接点的友好名称，控件使用该连接点 来表示 UI 中使用者的连接点。The `displayName` parameter is a friendly name of the consumer connection point that is used by the control to represent a consumer's connection point in the UI. `connectionPointType`参数必须是 从派生的 。The `connectionPointType` parameter must be a derived from . 如果指定此参数，则 用于创建连接点，而不是 与 Web 部件控件集一起提供的标准类。If this parameter is specified, the is used to create the connection point instead of the standard class provided with the Web Parts control set.

is not valid.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying a display name, an ID, and a specific type of connection point object to use for the consumer connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName`参数是使用者连接点的友好名称，控件使用该连接点 来表示 UI 中使用者的连接点。The `displayName` parameter is a friendly name of the consumer connection point that is used by the control to represent a consumer's connection point in the UI. `id`参数用于指定与特定回调方法关联的使用者连接点的 ID。The `id` parameter is used to specify the ID for the consumer connection point associated with the specific callback method. 一个控件可以有多个连接点，但 `id` 每个连接点必须是唯一的。A control can have multiple connection points, but the `id` for each must be unique. 因此，如果使用者控件中有多个回调方法，则构造函数的此重载非常有用。Therefore, this overload of the constructor is useful if you have multiple callback methods in your consumer control. `connectionPointType`参数必须是 从派生的 。The `connectionPointType` parameter must be a derived from . 如果指定此参数，则 用于创建连接点，而不是 与 Web 部件控件集一起提供的标准类。If this parameter is specified, the is used to create the connection point instead of the standard class provided with the Web Parts control set.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示连接点是否允许多个连接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the connection point allows multiple connections.

value.span: 如果连接点接受多个连接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the connection point accepts multiple connections; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，使用者连接不接受多个连接，因此，此属性设置为 `false` 。By default, consumer connections do not accept multiple connections, so this property is set to `false`. 但是，提供程序连接默认接受多个连接，而对象上的此属性 设置为 `true` 。Provider connections, however, do accept multiple connections by default, and this property on a object is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConnectionPointType As Type
public: property Type ^ ConnectionPointType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取使用者连接点的连接点类型。

span.span: Gets the connection point type of the consumer connection point.
A that indicates the type of the connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回 使用者连接点的。This property returns the of the consumer connection point. 必须从派生 ，并且当你 `connectionPointType` 使用回调方法中的 `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` 元数据元素声明参数时，将使用你声明的类型的实例来创建连接点而不是标准 类。The must derive from , and when you declare the `connectionPointType` parameter with a `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element on a callback method, an instance of the type you declare is used to create a connection point instead of the standard class.

exception.span: 使用的连接点类型（不是从 类派生的）无效。

span.span: An invalid connection point type (one that does not derive from the class) was used.

summary.span: 获取使用者连接点的友好名称。

span.span: Gets the friendly name of the consumer connection point.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串包含使用者连接点的友好显示名称。

span.span: A string containing a friendly display name for the consumer connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是使用者连接点的友好名称。This property is the friendly name of a consumer connection point. 当你将 `displayName` 参数添加到 `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` 回调方法上的元数据元素时，可以通过声明方式设置其值。Its value can be set declaratively, when you add the `displayName` parameter to a `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element on a callback method. 还可以通过使用受保护的属性以编程方式设置派生类 。It can also be set programmatically by a derived class, by using the protected property. 在搜索连接点集合时，应使用 属性，因为 ID 属性必须唯一，但 属性不需要。When you are searching through a connection point collection, you should use the property, because the ID property must be unique, but the property need not be. 当控件位于页面上时，将向用户显示使用者连接点的属性 ， (UI) 的连接用户界面处于打开状态，并且用户处于允许从中选择连接点以建立连接的视图中。The property of a consumer connection point is displayed to users when a control is on the page, the connection user interface (UI) is open, and the users are in a view where they are allowed to select connection points to establish a connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性，方法是说明如何 `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` 在使用者控件中的回调方法上声明 metadata 元素。The following code example demonstrates using the property, by showing how to declare the `ConnectionConsumerAttribute` metadata element on a callback method in a consumer control. 请注意，使用构造函数的最简单重载;仅 `displayName` 提供参数值。Note that the simplest overload of the constructor is used; only the `displayName` parameter value is supplied. 参数的值将成为属性的值 。The value of the parameter will become the value of the property. 有关运行代码示例所需的完整代码，请参阅 类概述。For the full code required to run the code example, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/rowconsumerwebpart.cs#5)] [!code-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/rowconsumerwebpart.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用作 属性值的字符串，用于本地化方案中。

span.span: Gets or sets the string used as the value of the property, for use in localization scenarios.

value.span: 用作 的值的字符串。

span.span: A string that is used as the value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此额外属性存在，以便您可以从派生 并提供本地化版本。This extra property exists so that you can derive from and provide a localized version. 派生的可本地化 特性将维护一个私有布尔字段，以指示该字段是否已本地化。The derived localizable attribute will maintain a private Boolean field to indicate whether it has been localized. 首次访问 属性时，它将查找本地化的字符串，然后使用 属性将本地化值分配给 属性。On the first access to the property, it will look up the localized string, and then use the property to assign the localized value to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ID As String
public: property System::String ^ ID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串表示使用者连接点的唯一标识。

span.span: Gets a string that represents the unique identity of the consumer connection point.

value.span: 指定给使用者连接点的唯一 ID。

span.span: The unique ID assigned to the consumer connection point.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果通过连接点集合搜索，则应使用 属性查找特定连接点。If searching through a connection point collection, you should use the property to locate a particular connection point. 此属性可用于区分同一名称的两个连接点。This property can be used to distinguish between two connection points of the same name. 使用者连接点可以具有相同的 属性值，但 属性必须不同。Consumer connection points can have the same property value, but the property must be different.
